name: ROCK & ASSOCIATES
description: Provides lobbying services to stakeholders in the Pharmacy Compounding industry.
sampleDescriptions: Legislation impacting the operation of pharmacy compounding, and access to compounded medications. H.R. 2871, Preserving Patient Access to Compounded Medications Act of 2017.
Appropriations to fund the implementation of regulations impacting pharmacy compounding.
